Drinks.description: A bold shot of espresso meets perfectly steamed milk, crowned with thick, frothy foam. The result? A velvety, full-bodied experience that balances rich intensity with creamy contrast—both invigorating and indulgent in every sip.
Drinks.name: Classic Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Fortified with Tradition

Drinks.description: Deep espresso entwines with golden caramel, yielding a drink both smooth and sumptuous. The buttery sweetness melds effortlessly with creamy milk, creating an experience that lingers—a delightful contrast of smokiness and warmth.
Drinks.name: Caramel Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Drenched in Golden Bliss

Drinks.description: A comforting infusion of robust espresso and delicate vanilla, where warmth and sweetness intertwine. Its creamy aroma and gentle finish invite one into an elegant moment, simple yet refined.
Drinks.name: Vanilla Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Enlightened with Velvet

Drinks.description: The rich embrace of roasted hazelnut meets the bold presence of espresso, weaving a tapestry of flavor. The nutty depth enhances the coffee’s natural warmth, mingling with smooth milk for an experience both indulgent and satisfying.
Drinks.name: HazeInut Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Embedded with taste

Drinks.description: A rich fusion of espresso and chocolate, where deep coffee notes meld with bittersweet cocoa for an irresistible balance of energy and indulgence. Velvety milk softens the bold flavors, creating a smooth, dessert-like experience that lingers in every sip. A perfect companion for both morning rituals and mid-day escapes.
Drinks.name: Mocha Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Fused with flavor

Drinks.description: A rich blend of espresso and smooth chocolate, this cappuccino balances bold intensity with gentle sweetness. The cocoa enhances the experience, creating a comforting and refined indulgence—perfect for a cozy moment of relaxation.
Drinks.name: Chocolate Cappuccino
Drinks.subTitle: Wrapped with Richness

Drinks.description: A rich, full-bodied espresso blended with perfectly steamed milk, creating a velvety texture and smooth finish. Its creamy balance allows the coffee’s natural depth to shine through, offering a comforting and refined experience with every sip.
Drinks.name: Cafè Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Classic Milk Coffee

Drinks.description: A smooth fusion of bold espresso and creamy vanilla-infused steamed milk, creating a luscious balance of sweetness and depth. The rich aroma enhances the experience, making each sip both comforting and indulgent.
Drinks.name: Vanilla Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Sweet & Smooth

Drinks.description: A decadent blend of bold espresso and creamy milk, infused with rich caramel and finished with a crisp layer of caramelized sugar. The deep, buttery sweetness enhances the coffee’s intensity, creating a luxurious and indulgent experience with every sip.
Drinks.name: Caramel Brulée Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Indulgent Caramel Bliss

Drinks.description: A comforting blend of rich espresso and smooth milk, infused with warm autumn spices and velvety pumpkin flavor. The subtle sweetness and aromatic depth create a cozy, seasonal indulgence that’s both bold and soothing.
Drinks.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Autumn Favorite

Drinks.description: A rich combination of bold espresso, velvety chocolate, and refreshing peppermint, finished with a cloud of whipped cream. The contrast of deep cocoa and cool mint creates a perfectly balanced indulgence—both invigorating and comforting.
Drinks.name: Iced Lavender Oatmilk Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Floral & Creamy

Drinks.description: A rich blend of bold espresso, smooth chocolate, and invigorating peppermint, crowned with a swirl of whipped cream. The contrast of deep cocoa and cool mint creates a vibrant, indulgent treat that’s both refreshing and comforting.
Drinks.name: Peppermint Mocha Latte
Drinks.subTitle: Minty Chocolate Treat

Drinks.description: A bold espresso infused with hot water, balancing its intensity while retaining depth. Aromatic, smooth, and rich, with subtle caramelized undertones and a lasting finish. Perfect black for boldness or with milk for a gentler touch.
Drinks.name: Caffè Americano
Drinks.subTitle: Smooth & Bold

Drinks.description: A chilled twist on the classic Americano, where bold espresso is poured over ice to create a crisp, invigorating experience. The cooling effect enhances the espresso’s depth, making each sip both smooth and refreshing. Perfect for warm days or when you need a revitalizing pick-me-up.
Drinks.name: Iced Caffè Americanos
Drinks.subTitle: Cool & Crisp

Drinks.description: A refined take on the Americano, enhanced with a swirl of whipped cream that softens its bold edge and adds a velvety richness. The espresso’s deep flavors meld beautifully with the airy texture, creating a smooth, indulgent experience.",         subTitle: "Rich & Creamy
Drinks.name: Viennese Americano
Drinks.subTitle: Rich & Creamy

Drinks.description: A smooth, caffeine-free take on the classic Americano, delivering its signature boldness without the kick. Deep, rich, and satisfying, it retains the essence of espresso while providing a mellow, relaxed experience.
Drinks.subTitle: Bold, No Buzz

Drinks.description: A harmonious fusion of espresso, hot water, and steamed milk, elevating the classic Americano with a velvety texture. The bold espresso is softened by the reamy richness, resulting in a smooth, balanced sip with a touch of warmth.
Drinks.name: Americano Misto
Drinks.subTitle: Smooth & Creamy

Drinks.description: A smooth and bold Americano enhanced with almond milk, introducing a subtle nutty sweetness that complements the rich espresso. The result is a balanced, dairy-free alternative with a velvety texture and a warm, toasty finish.
Drinks.name: Almondmilk Americano
Drinks.subTitle: Nutty & Bold

Drinks.description: A bold shot of espresso lightly topped with foamed milk, softening its intensity while maintaining its rich character. The contrast between deep coffee notes and airy froth creates a smooth yet invigorating experience.
Drinks.name: Espresso Macchiato
Drinks.subTitle: Bold & Marke

Drinks.description: A perfectly balanced fusion of espresso and steamed milk, where bold coffee notes meet creamy smoothness. The velvety texture enhances the richness of the brew, delivering a harmonious and satisfying experience in every sip.
Drinks.name: Cortado
Drinks.subTitle: Balanced & Velvety

Drinks.description: A velvety espresso drink crafted with finely textured microfoam milk, delivering a smooth and luxurious sip. The richness of the espresso blends seamlessly with the silky foam, creating a well-balanced and indulgent experience.
Drinks.name: Flat White
Drinks.subTitle: Smooth & Rich

Drinks.description: A rich espresso creation infused with vanilla syrup, steamed milk, and topped with a decadent caramel drizzle. The interplay of bold coffee, creamy sweetness, and silky texture makes each sip indulgent and satisfying.
Drinks.name: Caramel Macchiato
Drinks.subTitle: Sweet & Velvety

Drinks.description: A rich espresso blend infused with velvety chocolate, perfectly complemented by steamed milk. Finished with a luscious topping of whipped cream or cocoa powder, this indulgent drink delivers a smooth, decadent coffee experience.
Drinks.name: Caffè Mocha
Drinks.subTitle: Chocolate & Bold

Drinks.description: A vibrant espresso shaken vigorously with ice and sweetener, creating a frothy, chilled texture that enhances its bold flavors. Smooth, refreshing, and invigorating—perfect for an energizing coffee experience.
Drinks.name: Iced Shaken Espresso
Drinks.subTitle: Frothy & Refreshing
